paragraph.paragraph: Cluster folders have a context menu accessible by right clicking on the folder. The available items are as follows:

Add
This menu item is another submenu. See the below section on cluster_context_menu.xmladd_submenuAdd Submenu.

Revert to Folder
For all cluster_folders.xmlCluster Folders that have been cluster_folders.xmlpremotingpromoted, this item may be available. Selecting this context menu item will cluster_folders.xmlpremotingdemote the explicit cluster folder to a cluster_folders.xmlCluster Folder.

Remove
Removes the cluster and all of its subcluster folder's and files from the project. For any cluster_folders.xmlCluster Folders that were cluster_folders.xmlpremotingpromoted, their original folder will be returned to the project, as it exists on disk.

Rename
Displays an editable box permitting the renaming of the explicit cluster folder. Changing the name in ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfSolutionExplorerDialog.htmSolution Explorer will also change the ../../../configuring/project_configuration/item_configuration/clusters.xmlcluster_nameCluster Name property for the explicit cluster folder.

Add New Item...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box where you can select the EiffelEnvision ../../../configuring/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates to add to your project. For more information on adding new items, See ../../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.

Add Existing Item...
Adds an existing item under the Project Items folder. For more information on adding existing items, See ../../../configuring/adding_items/adding_existings_items.xmlAdding Existing Items.

New Folder
Adds a new cluster_folders.xmlCluster Folder under the Project Items folder. A new folder will also be created on disk at the project's location. For more information on adding new folders, See ../../../configuring/adding_items/adding_folders.xmlAdding New Folders.

Add New Cluster...
Adds a new explicit_clusters.xmlExplicit Cluster Folder under the Project Items folder. For more information on adding new clusters, see ../../../configuring/adding_items/adding_clusters.xmlAdding New Clusters.

Add Windows Form...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box with the EiffelEnvision Windows Form project item selected. For more information see ../../../configuring/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates. For more information on adding new items, See ../../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.

Add User Control...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box with the EiffelEnvision User Control project item selected. For more information see ../../../configuring/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates. For more information on adding new items, See ../../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.

Add Web Service...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box with the EiffelEnvision Web Service Class project item selected. For more information see ../../../configuring/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates. For more information on adding new items, See ../../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.

Add Component...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box with the EiffelEnvision Component project item selected. For more information see ../../../configuring/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates. For more information on adding new items, See ../../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.

Add Class...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box with the EiffelEnvision Class project item selected. For more information see ../../../configuring/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates. For more information on adding new items, See ../../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.

Add Resource...
Opens the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfAddNewItemDialogBox.htmAdd New Item dialog box with the EiffelEnvision Assembly Resource project item selected. For more information see ../../../configuring/adding_items/project_items.xmlNew Project Item Templates. For more information on adding new items, See ../../../configuring/adding_items/adding_items.xmlAdding New Items.
